author: Anonymous Atom
title: I clicker score
question: Hi my i clicker score is remain same i.e of last Tuesday and that class is excused From i clicker but for my next 3 classes it didn’t show but my attendance is 100 and I do all the questions. Can anyone please help me in this?
student_answer: Hi, our score on the iclicker app doesn't reflect our true grade. Our iclicker grades will most likely be posted on canvas at some point.
